title: We are looking for a highly skilled and proactive Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote) to join our growing tea
job_overview:
We are looking for a highly skilled and proactive Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager (Remote) to join our growing team.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month (based on experience and performance)

Responsibilities:

Manage advertising campaigns on Google Ads and Meta (Facebook) Ads.

Optimize and track performance metrics such as CTR, CPC, ROAS.

Analyze data to ensure continuous improvement.

Requirements:

1+ year proven experience running Google or Facebook Ads.

Strong knowledge of digital marketing KPIs.

Ability to work independently in a remote environment.
